Structs/Service.html#/s:9Simulator7Servi.abstract: Compares two instances of a Service and returns true if the two instances are the same.

Structs/Runtime.html#/s:9Simulator7Runti.name: bundlePath

Structs/Runtime.html#/s:9Simulator7Runti.abstract: If the runtime is not available, this string includes a description of explaining why it’s not available.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: A string that summarizes the device availability.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: isAvailable
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: True if the device is available.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: state
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: A string that represents the state of the device.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: name
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: The name of the device.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: udid
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Device unique identifier.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: When the device is not available, this string contains

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: runtimeName
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Name of the device runtime.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: isBooted
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: True if the device is booted.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: list()
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Gets the list of devices from the system.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: runtimePlatform()
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Returns the device runtime platform.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: launch()
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Launches the device.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: launchApp(_:)
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Launches the given app from the device.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: kill()
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Kills the device. It findes the process associated to it and kills it.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: install(_:)
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Installs the given app on the device.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: deviceType()
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Returns the type of device reading the value from the device plist file.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: runtimeIdentifier()
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Returns the device runtime identifier.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: globalPreferences()
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Returns the device global preferences.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: plist()
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Returns the device device.plist content.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: runtime()
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Returns the device runtime.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: globalPreferencesPlistPath()
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Return the path to the global preferences plist fine.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: devicePlistPath()
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Returns the path to the device device.plist file.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Returns the device home directory.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Returns all the services that are available on this device.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: It reloads the device state until a certain condition is met.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.name: reload()
Structs/Device.html#/s:9Simulator6Device.abstract: Reloads the device’s attributes and syncs them with the simctl output.
Compares two devices returning true if both devices are the same.

Structs/Device.html.name: Device
Structs/Device.html.abstract: Model that represents a device returned by simctl.

Structs/Runtime.html.name: Runtime
Structs/Runtime.html.abstract: This class represents a simctl runtime. In Xcode, a runtime is a pair of an OS and its version, for example iOS 12.1

Structs/Service.html.name: Service
Structs/Service.html.abstract: It represents a service running on a simulator.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9SimulatorE7.abstract: Trims whitespace from both ends of a string, if the resulting

Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.name: noOutput
Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.abstract: Thrown the underlying command doesn’t return any output.

Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.name: jsonSerialize(_:)
Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.abstract: Thrown when the JSON output cannot be parsed.

Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.name: jsonDecode(_:)
Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.abstract: Thrown when the JSON output cannot be decoded.

Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.name: plistSerialize(_:)
Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.abstract: Thrown when a plist file cannot be decoded.

Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.name: invalidFormat
Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.abstract: Thrown when the command output has an invalid/unexpected output.

Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.name: deviceTypeNotFound
Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.abstract: Thrown when a device type cannot be obtained.

Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.name: runtimeNotFound
Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.abstract: Thrown when a device runtime cannot be found.

Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.name: runtimeProfileNotFound
Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.abstract: Thrown when the simulator runtime profile cannot be found.

Enums/SimulatorError.html#/s:9Simulator0.name: xcodeNotFound
